text:
Please add a directive to nominate an external stylesheet for mod_autoindex. A
link would be added to the external stylesheet in every directory listing
(unless a header file is present in that directory as per HeaderName and
SuppressHTMLPreamble is not set). This will allow webmasters to configure more
thoroughly the default appearance of their directory indexes.

It would also be useful to include link elements in the head.
Especially useful is
<link rel="Up" href="[parent directory]"/>
creator: richard.beton@roke.co.uk

text:
Support for adding Style Sheets is available in 2.1:
